thread.title: PMO: Former govt chief sec to head special task force probing Bank Negara's 1990s forex losses
thread.title_full: PMO: Former govt chief sec to head special task force probing Bank Negara's 1990s forex losses

title: PMO: Former govt chief sec to head special task force probing Bank Negara's 1990s forex losses
text:
48 PM PMO: Former govt chief sec to head special task force probing Bank Negara's 1990s forex losses 
KUALA LUMPUR: The Cabinet has appointed former chief secretary to the Government Mohd Sidek Hassan (pic) to head a task force carrying out a probe into Bank Negara Malaysia's foreign exchange (forex) losses in the 1990s. 
More to come
